imdb.title: Tokyo Majin
imdb.plot: A force of supernatural darkness is unleashing the walking dead on Tokyo, and five high school students with extraordinary powers - and nothing in common - must band together to fight the scourge.

episodes.title: Fourth Night: The Fist Does Not Take Lives
episodes.plot: Kyouichi raises his new blade against Ukon. As the rest of the gang takes on swarms of mystical enemies, Tatsuma's reality is turned upside down by shocking revelations regarding his past.

episodes.title: Fifth Night: The Protecting Fist
episodes.plot: As the group tries to identify the one responsible for the recent madness, Tatsuma once again comes face to face with Marie - and she wants him dead.

episodes.title: Sixth Night: Story of Byakko - A Mirthless Christmas Eve
episodes.plot: During the season of giving, Tatsuma is stunned beyond comprehension to find those closest to him brutally taken away by a murderous fiend known as Chaos.

episodes.title: Seventh Night: Story of Genbu - Chaos
episodes.plot: With pain and madness in the winter air, Tatsuma must decide what kind of man he truly is when he gets his hands on the psychotic killer known as Chaos.

episodes.title: Eighth Night: Story of Suzaku - Destruction Day
episodes.plot: Tatsuma's friends are worried he's spending too much time trying to help Ryuuji. But bigger concerns are on the horizon - an evil like no other is about to strike.

episodes.title: Ninth Night: Story of Seiryu - Gathering Stars of Fate
episodes.plot: The world is in serious danger as Yagyu delivers death to many in an incredibly brutal battle. Unless Tatsuma's team reaches unimaginable levels of power, the situation is truly hopeless.

episodes.title: Eleventh Night: Walk Onward, Children
episodes.plot: A glimpse into the past reveals the friendships and struggles along the path undertaken by Tatsuma and his powerful friends.

episodes.title: First Night: Moment of the Demonic Encounter
episodes.plot: A powerful new threat emerges when a violent and bold group of masked assailants attacks Tatsuma and his friends.

episodes.title: Second Night: Purgatorial Hell
episodes.plot: While some of the gang hears details about the infamous Martial Fists, the rest of the team is learning about their new enemies the hard way - engaged in amazingly fierce battle!

episodes.title: Third Night: Let's Change Ourselves from the Inside
episodes.plot: As Daigo and Kyouichi deal with strange events in the present, scenes from the past reveal painful moments that shaped them into the young men they've become.

episodes.title: Fourth Night: The Gathering
episodes.plot: The group gets tangled in a brawl between Raito and his demonic former bandmate, Ryouichi. When the battle ends, it becomes obvious that someone is behind the growing evil that threatens the city.

episodes.title: Fifth Night: Dream Hell
episodes.plot: Across the city, high school students are falling into unexplainable comas, and Kisaragi seems to have a hunch about what's happening. He better act fast - for Aoi's sake.

episodes.title: Sixth Night: Living Hell
episodes.plot: When his waking life turned into a nightmare, a boy created a world of dreams. Aoi's consciousness is trapped within his tortured mind, and her friends are running out of time to save her.

episodes.title: Seventh Night: The Demoniacal Horde
episodes.plot: After centuries, the Demoniacal Horde is rising once more. Kisaragi and the gang confront the one responsible for unleashing the dark force of evil - Kozunu.

episodes.title: Eighth Night: The Hole Lady
episodes.plot: A demonic girl is wandering the streets, ripping the right arm off of anyone who crosses her path. Unfortunately for Komaki, that path leads straight to the archery tournament.

episodes.title: Ninth Night: Gently & Furiously
episodes.plot: As Komaki struggles to regain her strength and confidence, Aoi is happy to find she has the power to heal the misery of others - and it seems Kozunu is excited about her new powers too.

episodes.title: Tenth Night: Story of the Golden Dragon - Cherry Blossoms That Do Not Fall
episodes.plot: Kisaragi was warned long ago - if the Bodhisattva Eye appears, he must kill the person who possesses the power. Unfortunately, the dreaded power has stirred in someone he's spent his life protecting.

episodes.title: Eleventh Night: Scattered Blossoms, Divergent Lives
episodes.plot: While the rest of the gang deals with Aoi - and the new powers given to her by the Bodhisattva Eye - Tatsuma's heart leads him into a tragic trap set by Kozunu.

episodes.title: Twelfth Night: Revival of the Kozunu
episodes.plot: The violent history of the Bodhisattva Eye is revealed. As Kozunu uses Aoi's power to resurrect his people, Tatsuma and his friends prepare for battle.

episodes.title: Thirteenth Night: Valley of the Dark Arts
episodes.plot: Tatsuma leads the team in an epic battle against Kozunu's dark forces. As severe wounds are dealt to both sides, Aoi's destiny hangs in the balance.
